text: isave! Niccayamaka nan um'maik kaipparruven;. Innum ennalavil um'mai uyarttik kolven;. Nirakarittuk kontirupporutaiya (poykalil ninrum) um'mait tuymaippatuttuven;. Melum um'maip pinparruvorai kiyama nal varai nirakaripporukku melakavum vaippen;. Pinnar unkalutaiya tirumputal ennitame irukkiratu. (Appotu) ninkal tarkkam ceytu kontiruntatu parri nan unkalitaiye tirppalippen" enru allah kuriyatai (napiye! Ninaivu kurviraka)
